price: Аллаху, заиста, ништа није скривено, ни на Земљи, ни на небу.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَخۡفَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ شَيۡءٞ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha lā yakhfā ʿalayhi shayon fī al-arḍi walā fī al-samāi
